com.marshalchen.common.ui.materialmenu

类 MaterialMenuBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marshalchen.common.ui.materialmenu.MaterialMenuBase
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MaterialMenu
    直接已知子类:
    MaterialMenuIcon, MaterialMenuIconCompat, MaterialMenuIconToolbar

    public abstract class MaterialMenuBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements MaterialMenu
    Base class for ActionBar implementations of MaterialMenuDrawable
    另请参阅:
    MaterialMenuIcon

      • setTransformationOffset

        public final void setTransformationOffset(MaterialMenuDrawable.AnimationState animationState,
                           float value)
        从接口复制的说明: MaterialMenu
        Manually set a transformation value for an MaterialMenuDrawable.AnimationState
        指定者:
        setTransformationOffset 在接口中 MaterialMenu
        参数:
        animationState - state to set value in
        value - between MaterialMenuDrawable.TRANSFORMATION_START and MaterialMenuDrawable.TRANSFORMATION_END.

      • getDrawable

        public final MaterialMenuDrawable getDrawable()
        指定者:
        getDrawable 在接口中 MaterialMenu
        返回:
        MaterialMenuDrawable to be used for the menu

      • setNeverDrawTouch

        public final void setNeverDrawTouch(boolean neverDrawTouch)
        Overwrites behaviour of pressed state circle animation even when using animatePressedState(com.marshalchen.common.ui.materialmenu.MaterialMenuDrawable.IconState)
        参数:
        neverDrawTouch - true to never draw pressed state circle animation
